briefdescription.para: Flag indicating if the transform has changed since the last update.
Checks whether this component is enabled.
Checks if the transform is dirty.

simplesect.para: True if the transform has changed, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Resets the dirty flag to true when acquired.

detaileddescription.para: Makes sure the transform is considered after the component was acquired.

briefdescription.para: Resets the dirty flag to true when released.

detaileddescription.para: Makes sure the entities dirty-state is reset to the default state.

simplesect.para: The 4x4 matrix representing local translation, rotation, and scale.
Reference to this component for chaining.
Reference to this component for chaining.
Reference to this component for chaining.

briefdescription.para: Translates the component locally by a delta vector.

parameterdescription.para: The vector to add to the current position.

simplesect.para: Reference to this component for chaining.
The position relative to the parent.
The rotation relative to the parent.
The scale relative to the parent.

briefdescription.para: Sets the world transform matrix directly.
Returns the current world transform matrix.

simplesect.para: Const reference to the world transform.

briefdescription.para: Extracts the world translation from the world transform.
Component that holds transformation data (position, rotation, scale).

detaileddescription.para: The ComposeTransformComponent manages the spatial state of a GameObject. It stores the local transform (relative to parent) and the computed world transform. Changes to local properties mark the component as dirty, signaling systems to recompute the world transform.
